name: BattleVerse
description: BattleVerse.io is a P2E online game powered by DeFi x NFT and blockchain technology. Binance Smart Chain GameFi Hackathon prize winner. Our main goal is to give you the opportunity to earn through fun gameplay, even if you are not an experienced player in the world of Play-to-Earn (P2E) games Your every action in the huge game world, be it a battle, resource extraction, or completing missions and quests, will generate income.
